title: Kendrick Lamar takes crown for most first-day album streams on Apple Music so far this year
content:
Kendrick Lamar’s new album Mr. Morale & The Big Steppers has taken the crown for the most first-day album streams on Apple Music so far in 2022. The hip-hop/rap album released on Friday May 13 and is the performer’s fifth studio album. While the album has seen success so far, Apple Music hasn’t revealed how many streams there were the first day.

more…

The post Kendrick Lamar takes crown for most first-day album streams on Apple Music so far this year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Kendrick Lamar's new album 'Mr. Morale & The Big Steppers' has the most first-day album streams on Apple Music so far in 2022.
